EmailTemplate.name: FP HK - Supplies (Request Cancell - Wrong vertical)
EmailTemplate.subject: foodpanda Partner Support Case Follow-up - Request Cancelled // Case number: #XXXXXXXXXX Foodpanda個案跟進 - 申請取消（個案編號：#XXXXXXXXXX）
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Partner,
Thank you for submiting the paper bag/rolls order (Case Number: #XXXXXXXXXX). Your submission has been cancelled due to selected the wrong vendor type.
Please select your vendor type - Restaurant / Mall carefully when you re-submit the request.
Please feel free to let us know if you have further requests by submitting via the Partner Support Request Form. Thank you for your continued support on foodpanda. https://foodpandasg.formstack.com/forms/foodpanda_support_hk
Warm regards, foodpanda Partner Support Team
親愛的合作夥伴：
感謝您早前提交有關的紙袋/ 紙卷申請。我們發現閣下選擇了錯誤的店鋪類型，因此此申請（個案編號：#XXXXXXXXXX）已被取消。 請重新提交夥伴申請表格，並選擇正確的餐廳類型 - 餐廳 / 商店。
如有更多問題，歡迎透過夥伴支援申請表格提交你的申請。感謝您繼續支持foodpanda。 https://foodpandasg.formstack.com/forms/foodpanda_support_hk
foodpanda夥伴支援團隊
